Articles.Content: I'm starting to get a very long list of rockets and aircraft. Is there a mod that adds a folder system to the save/load screen in the VAB/SPH?
Have a look at my mod ["CraftHistory"](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/110703) this adds categories to the craft loading.
Nice, that is right along the lines of what I'm looking for, thx.
